description: This is a Python test case script that defines a runtime test for checking if the kernel has the CONFIG_PREEMPT_RT option enabled. It imports test case classes and decorators, defines a class RtTest that inherits from OERuntimeTestCase, and includes a test method to verify the kernel configuration.

classes.name: RtTest
classes.description: A test case class that checks whether the kernel has the PREEMPT_RT configuration enabled.

methods.name: test_is_rt(self)
methods.description: A test method that runs 'uname -a' on the target device and asserts that 'PREEMPT_RT' is present in the output, indicating the real-time kernel configuration is enabled.
